message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as you'll be getting it for less than what it's worth to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500 for the product.
Bob, thanks for the counteroffer.  I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. I'm willing to drop down to $9,750.  Let's see if we can make this work.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $9,600 for the product.
